title: Mixed Paradigm-Based Social Job Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Phenomena and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement for Working Professionals. Conducted in a Self-Directed Learning Environment Using Digital Devices, with Project-Based Assessments Measuring Real-World Application Skills

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply an integrated objectivist-constructivist instructional design model to practical cases within four weeks
Learners can complete social problem-solving projects incorporating peer feedback using digital collaboration tools
Learners can effectively compose workplace conflict management scenarios at over 80% proficiency based on knowledge acquired during learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
